rewards.description: Destiny: Rising delivers the iconic looter-shooter gameplay from the Destiny franchise to mobile platforms, featuring missions, strikes, PvP battles, and six-player PvE activities along with a variety of open world objectives. The game will offer players dynamic and challenging single, co-op, and competitive multiplayer gameplay. From November 27 to December 24, several fun and challenging PVP gameplays are available and we will give some special in game items as exclusive winter gifts to our fans on Twitch!  Gear up and join the fight in the top-tier sci-fi RPG shooter, Lightbearers!

rewards.description: Tune in as The Dawning returns to Destiny 2 for a Winter Wonderland event! Watch any D2 stream for 30 minutes to unlock the 'This Moment Forever' emblem and Subscribe or Gift a Sub to your favorite opted-in Destiny 2 streamer and receive the Awake at Night Emblem! This Emblem will be available from 16 December at 9AM PT until 30 December at 9AM PT, throughout The Dawning. You must link your Bungie account to Twitch to receive the Emblem. You can redeem the Emblem by logging into your Bungie.net account and going to the Partner Rewards section of the Code Redemption area.

rewards.description: 🎮 Announcing Kakele Online's Epic Twitch Drops!  Embark on a unique journey in Kakele's realm. Dive into mystical lands, conquer quests, and enjoy our exciting Twitch Drops for enhanced gaming. Unlock rewards, including teleports, herbs, potions, and materials.  🕒 Timed Rewards: Enjoy cities Teleports, Ultra potions, Gold Refiner Kits and collect Dog Cards and Trophies.  💰 Prosperity Path: Gain Copper, Tin, Silver, Iron, Gold, Life Herbs, Mana Herbs for success. Accumulate Reputation Coins.  🎈 Grand Finale: End with an exclusive Twitch Drop and Bacon Extravaganza surprise! Link accounts, watch streams, and claim rewards for an unforgettable RPG experience.  🌟 How to Join:  Link Accounts: Connect your account and Twitch in the game app. Watch Streams: Tune in during to your favorite Kakele streamer. Claim Rewards: Receive Twitch Drop notifications claim in the game app.  Influencers: To enable drops on your stream, email us!  Don't miss the chance to enrich your journey with Twitch Drops!
rewards.name: Kakele Online December 2

rewards.description:
Starting Monday 15th December and running until Friday 2nd January, Sea of Thieves is partnering with Twitch for Support A Streamer!  

Viewers who purchase or gift two qualifying subscriptions will receive the Amethyst Mercenary Wheel, Figurehead, Cannons and Capstan, while those who purchase or gift three qualifying subscriptions will also receive the Ebon Double Barrel Pistol. 

Keep an eye on the Sea of Thieves social channels for more details and news on other Festival of Giving events!  Want to take part? Don't forget to link your Twitch and Sea of Thieves accounts by following the steps here: https://www.seaofthieves.com/twitch-drops
rewards.name: Support A Streamer 2025

rewards.description: Watch any Super Animal Royale stream (with drops enabled) to earn your own RGB cosmetics in-game! Play free on PC, Mac, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X|S all with cross-play and cross-save account syncing.

To celebrate both the new season preview and also our MoreFun Studio's 15th Anniversary, we're thrilled to present a in-game limited-edition reward: the exclusive MoreFun 15th Anniversary Full Set！
Now unlock this commemorative set exclusively via Twitch Drops! Watch for 4 hours to redeem it - don't miss out Please link your Level Infinite Pass account and Twitch account on the event page (https://www.arenabreakoutinfinite.com/twitchdrops ), and claim your Drops rewards in time.
